response.overview: A group of excavators go out to find the legend known by villagers in Mt. Fuji known as rodan, a pteranodon, once they get there, inconveniences get in their way when godzilla rises from the depths to wreck havoc again, will godzilla, the army, and our heroes stop this new monster named Jiger????? Godzilla is not an enemy but as the movie flows, everyone is against him instead of our main characters. Will the world forget godzilla saved them and not fight the main villains in this jaw-dropping movie of the summer!?!?!? Watch it and find out!!!
response.tagline: 2nd Installment to the Godzilla KCW Series
response.title: Godzilla: Attack of Jiger - Part 2

results.name: Godzilla: Attack of Jiger - Part 2 || FULL MOVIE (2015)
